dct_title_s: Blanchard's guide map of Chicago. [cartographic material]
dct_description_sm: fire districts, "fire signals," and "legal hack or cab fares."; Chicago in 1812;Old Fort Dearborn [view]. Includes "street guide," "location of additions and subdivisions," "ward limits," 1-16;1 map, hand colored;91 x 65 cm.;ca. 1:14,700
